WorkItem.Description:
The following errors gets thrown when you attempt to empty an offhand (after equipping a 2 handed item in the mainhand slot).  The error happens when you mouseover the Empty slot in the equip list, not actually when you attempt to equip it.
 
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments:
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=3.0.50106.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException
 
   at Rawr.UI.ItemTooltip.UpdateTooltip()
   at Rawr.UI.ItemTooltip.set_ItemInstance(ItemInstance value)
   at Rawr.UI.ItemListControl.item_MouseEnter(Object sender, MouseEventArgs e)
   at System.Windows.CoreInvokeHandler.InvokeEventHandler(Int32 typeIndex, Delegate handlerDelegate, Object sender, Object args)
   at MS.Internal.JoltHelper.FireEvent(IntPtr unmanagedObj, IntPtr unmanagedObjArgs, Int32 argsTypeIndex, String eventName)
